WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling by Application Before Navigation
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: data lo_call type ref to if_wd_html_script_call.
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
DATA: lo_context_node_info TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node_info,
lt_mara TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF mara,
static_element_type = 'MARA' " Qualified Type Name for RTTI
name = 'MARA' " Web Dynpro: Name of Context Node
ui_parent = lo_container " UI Container in which Table Is to Be Located
